subtitle: description
body: This role will begin in a 6 month contract with the possibility of extension for the right individual.
Our corporate offices in Toronto and Burlington are searching for a highly motivated Developer who is willing to propel themselves into unknown territory.
This role will be remote to start and may become 50% at the office in the future with the successful candidate selecting which office location to attend.
As part of this role, the developer will sometimes provide supports; requirements gathering; maintaining and building features.

subtitle: Responsibilities Include
body: Enhancing, developing, and maintaining, a web page application.
Analyzing, diagnosing and resolving errors related to applications.
Designing, coding, testing, debugging and documenting software according to specifications.
Perform other technical related activities as determined by the marketing department.
Follow defined development standards.
Interact with different business department to determine and understand business requirements.
Research and evaluate various technologies to meet business requirements.

subtitle: Skills & Experience
body: Post-secondary in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
Working knowledge and understanding using JavaScript/jQuery, T-SQL, C#, and object-oriented programming (OOP).
Database experience on Microsoft SQL.
Able to communicate complex technical information in a manner that is understandable to a broad range of stakeholders and including the different business units.
Ability to balance competing priorities, complex situations, and tight deadlines.
Detail oriented, well organized, and independently competent.
Demonstrated ability to multitask and work in a fast –paced, entrepreneurial office setting.
Office suites.
Understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle.
